title: Eritrean President Isaias Afwerki: ‘We Need a New Financial Architecture Not Controlled by the Dollar or the Euro’
description: Isaias Afwerki, president of Eritrea, reinforced the need for building a new economic system away from the traditional centers of power. At the second Russia-Africa Summit, Afwerki told Russian President Vladimir Putin that the current world order, on top of dollar hegemony, was printing money and weaponizing its position using sanctions, trying to contain the […]

title: Upbit temporarily suspends CRV trading amidst critical security Flaws in Curve Finance
description: Upbit, a prominent cryptocurrency exchange based in South Korea, has taken the precautionary measure of suspending trading for the CRV token, which is utilized by Curve Finance, a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform. This decision comes after discovering critical security flaws within the Curve (CRV) stablecoin pools, leading to significant concerns about its stability and safety ... Read more

title: Secret Bitcoin mining ring busted in Borneo
description: Authorities in the town of Miri on Borneo Island have dealt a significant blow to an illegal Bitcoin mining operation after receiving a tip-off from the public. The operation came to light when Sarawak Energy, the local utility company, stumbled upon the illicit activity, which involved 34 cryptocurrency mining servers running on stolen electricity obtained ...
